column1: #: description: Inclusive J/$\psi$ nuclear modification factor $R_{\rm AA}$ at midrapidity
column3: as a function of mean number of participating nucleons in Pb$-$Pb collisions at $\sqrt{s_{\rm NN}} = 5.02$ TeV. The correlated systematic uncertainty due to the pp reference is not included and amounts to 6.9%
column4: shown as the red box around unity in the paper figure.

column1: #: keyword reactions: PB PB --> J/PSI X
